title: The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Tuesday
text:
The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Tuesday

Get great prices on the things you actually want. (Photo: Reviewed)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

In my opinion, there couldn't be anything more exciting than waking up to a great deal on a product you actually want. And this morning, I woke up to several on Amazon. I'm talking about soundbars, the Squatty Potty, and robot vacuums—and I'm adding these things to my cart right now. Not only were these products highly rated after going through rigorous tests in Reviewed's lab in Cambridge, but they're also at some of their lowest prices. Check out all the ways you can save this Tuesday.

1. One day only: A great soundbar at its lowest price

Upgrade your TVs sound at a great price. (Photo: Yamaha)

Let's be honest: Your TV's sound probably isn't the best—and if you're tired of turning up the volume while watching the latest episode of The Masked Singer, then you're going to need a soundbar. Right now, you can get one of our favorite ones for its lowest price. The Yamaha YAS-207BL Sound Bar an upgraded version of our runner up in our roundup of the best soundbars under $200. We like that it delivered a ton of features (treble and bass control, Bluetooth, Clear Voice, bass boost) in a slim, stylish bar that delivers great sound.

Get the Yamaha YAS-207BL Sound Bar for $169.99 (Save $59.96)

2. Lowest price every: The cult-favorite Squatty Potty

The number one to take a number two. (Photo: Squatty Potty)

When it comes to the No. 1 thing for No. 2, it has to be the Squatty Potty. This innovative product earned a cult-following after being seen on Shark Tank. Here's how it works: The stool is designed to help relax your Puborectalis muscle, which in turn makes it easier to take care of your backdoor business. With a 4.4-star rating, more than 4,500 reviewers swear that it actually works. So you really don't want to sit on this deal.

Get the Squatty Potty for $17.49 (Save $7.50)

3. $10 off: The best electric kettle we've ever tested

This cordless electric kettle boils water fast. (Photo: Reviewed / Betsey Goldwasser)

Traditional stovetop kettles are a thing of the past. Electric kettles boil the water much faster, and you don't have to hear an annoying whistle go off. Right now, you can get our favorite electric kettle for its second lowest price and a nice $10 discount. We're obsessed with it because it allows you to select the perfect temperature for brewing specific teas and coffee, it beeps when it's done, and it boils water the fastest of all the kettles we tested.

Get the Cuisinart PerfecTemp 1.7 Liter Electric Kettle for $60.83 (Save $10.16)

4. Lowest price: An SD card for all of your family photos

With prices this low, you might as well stock up on extra memory cards. (Photo: SanDisk)

With the upcoming holidays, you're probably going to want to take a lot of photos to capture memories—especially on Halloween. If you choose to snap your pics using a camera instead of a phone, you might want to get a new SD card so you have enough memory while capturing precious moments. Right now, you can get a SanDisk 32GB Ultra SD card for its lowest price. SanDisk makes the best SD cards we've ever tested and the Ultra is perfect for compact-to-midrange point-and-shoot digital cameras.

Get the SanDisk 32GB Ultra SD Card for $6.60 (Save $1)

5. $70 off: An affordable smart robot vacuum

Combine smart technology and cleaning power—all for a great price. (Photo: Eufy)

Robot vacuums can help you out with one of the most dreaded chores, which is especially useful during the busy holiday season. Plus, you don't have to spend too much on a great one. The Eufy Robovac 30 is a version of the best affordable smart robot vacuum we've ever tested, and right now it's $70 off. We liked the 30C model because it has an intuitive app, magnetic strips to block off spaces, and can be controlled via Amazon Alexa or Google Home Assistant. It's a smart homeowner's dream, and you can expect similar performance with the 30 model.

Get the Eufy BoostIQ Robovac 30 for $199.99 (Save $70)

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
